bike.description: P. Series Reynolds 520 Cr-Mo, double-butted TT/DT, externally relieved HT, disc mount, 6mm offset horizontal drop out w/ integrated tensioner system, includes multispeed hardware, disc only

components.description: Marzocchi DJ3, 80mm, Cr-Mo steerer, 32mm Cr-Mo stanchions, magnesium lower, cold forged crown, fixed rate damping, coil/mcu w/ preload adj., "stiff" spring
Integrated cartridge bearing, Campy type, 1-1/8" threadless
SBC Aggro Stem, 3D forged/CNC, 4-bolt, 35mm length
Alloy riser bar, 55mm rise, 680mm wide, 8 degree back sweep, 7 degree up
Fuse BMX, single compound, closed end, 140mm
Avid BB5, mechanical disc, 160mm G2 Clean Sweep rotor
Avid BB5, mechanical disc, 140mm G2 Clean Sweep rotor
Avid FR-5, alloy, two-finger, linear pull
Single speed, Cr-Mo, 1/8" x 12t
KMC Z510HX, 1/2" x 1/8", anti-drop inner links
Fuse tubular heat treated Cr-Mo 2pc w/ hollow 19mm spindle
CNC cut 6061, 25t, Motostar design
Threaded Euro, alloy cups, 4x cartridge bearing, alloy spacers
SBC Lo-A1, Alloy platform w/ removable pins, 9/16"
P.Disc AM, double wall disc w/ eyelets, 36h
Forged alloy, machined high/low flange and disc mount, ground race, 36h, nutted 3/8" axle
Forged alloy single speed cassette, machined flanges and disc mount, double sealed, ground race, 36h, nutted 3/8" axle, 1/8" x 12t cog
2mm (14g) stainless
Specialized Rhythm Lite Control, 26x2.3", 60TPI, aramid bead
Specialized Rhythm Lite Control, 26x2.3", 60TPI, aramid bead
Schraeder valve
Specialized Fuse Lo Pro, 8mm rails, PVC bumpers front and rear
Alloy two bolt, no offset, micro adjust, 25.4mm
Integrated w/ replaceable single bolt
Reflectors, owners manual
